article_summary: World Humanoid Robot Games in Beijing showcase robotics innovation and public interest, with a focus on robots serving humans rather than replacing them. Meanwhile, China's AG600 amphibious aircraft completes a test flight, and Tsinghua University partners with an African developer for a communication research hub. The articles also highlight advancements in AI, spacesuits, and smart technology, as well as collaborative efforts in AI medical research and cancer technology sharing.</s>
